content.p:
ยง 175-p. Reports of sale. Within three days after the sale under
permit, as provided in this article, shall have been held, the person
who conducted the sale shall send a statement to the department giving a
complete list of the number and kind of baby chicks sold at such sale,
together with the representations and guarantees made in relation
thereto, if any were made by the person who conducted such sale, and the
person conducting such sale shall be held to have had full knowledge of
the representations and guarantees made at the time of such sale and
shall be as fully responsible and liable for any such representations
and guarantees as is the person who set forth such representations and
guarantees on the containers as provided in section one hundred
seventy-five-o of this chapter.
